derivation: the same as H7013 (קַיִן) (with a play upon the affinity to H7069 (קָנָה));
outline:
Cain = "possession"
  1. eldest son of Adam and Eve and the first murderer having murdered his brother Abel Kenite = "smiths"
  2. the tribe from which the father-in-law of Moses was a member and which lived in the area between southern Palestine and the mountains of Sinai
strongs_def: Kajin, the name of the first child, also of a place in Palestine, and of an Oriental tribe
